results.description: Manchester United move into seventh place in the Premier League with a straightforward win over Brighton at Old Trafford.
results.shortTitle: Man Utd ease to victory over Brighton
results.title: Manchester United 3-1 Brighton: United go seventh after comfortable win over Brighton

results.description: Manchester United boss Ole Gunner Solskjaer was full of praise for his side after they beat Brighton 3-1 to move into the top half of the table.
results.title: Manchester United 3-1 Brighton: Ole Gunner Solskjaer praises 'excellent' Man Utd win

results.description: Graham Potter says Manchester United deserved their win after his Brighton side were beaten 3-1 at Old Trafford, and describes United's strikers as "exceptional".
results.title: Manchester United 3-1 Brighton: Graham Potter concedes Albion were second best

results.description: Mark Lawrenson takes on 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham to make predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool to beat Man City and go nine clear?
results.title: Premier League predictions: Lawro vs 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham

results.description: Norwich manager Daniel Farke says he will take some of the blame for Brighton's second goal as he made a substitution before a decisive set piece that led to Shane Duffy securing victory for the hosts.
results.shortTitle: I take some of the blame for Brighton's second goal - Farke
results.title: Brighton 2-0 Norwich: I take some blame for Brighton's second goal - Farke

results.description: Brighton boss Graham Potter says his side "deserved" the 2-0 victory over Norwich to secure their third successive home win in the Premier League.
results.title: Brighton 2-0 Norwich: 'Deserved victory' pleases Potter

results.description: Substitutes Leandro Trossard and Shane Duffy earn Brighton their second successive league win and condemn Norwich to their fifth defeat in six matches.
results.title: Brighton & Hove Albion 2-0 Norwich City

thumbnail.altText: Leandro Trossard in action for Brighton

results.description: Mark Lawrenson makes his predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

results.title: Premier League predictions: Lawro looks at this weekend's top-flight games

results.description: Brighton take on Norwich in the Premier League - follow Final Score and live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Brighton and Hove Albion v Norwich City
results.title: Brighton and Hove Albion v Norwich in the Premier League

results.description: Chelsea beat Watford in the Premier League after Liverpool and Man City win - watch Final Score, listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports and extra and follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Ben Foster denied Watford leveller as Chelsea hang on - reaction
results.title: Premier League latest: Man City and Liverpool among those in action after Bournemouth beat Manchester United

results.description: The father and son were accused of shouting abuse at a Brighton player and their fans.
results.shortTitle: Burnley fans abuse trial collapses over 'failings'
results.title: Burnley fans abuse trial collapses due to 'failings'

results.description: BBC Sport looks at another day of VAR controversy in the Premier League.
results.title: VAR: More disagreement on VAR use in Premier League on Saturday

thumbnail.altText: TV screen shows VAR decision at Brighton

results.description: Brighton boss Graham Potter says his "heart needs a rest" after Lucas Digne's injury-time own goal gifts three points to his side.
results.shortTitle: My heart needs a rest after injury-time own goal - Potter
results.title: Brighton 3-2 Everton: My heart needs a rest - Graham Potter

results.description: Lucas Digne scores an own goal in injury time to gift three points to Brighton in a scrappy encounter at Amex Stadium.
results.shortTitle: Late Digne own goal gifts Brighton win
results.title: Brighton 3-2 Everton: Lucas Digne scores late own goal to hand win to Seagulls

results.description: Everton boss Marco Silva is frustrated by the inconsistencies from video assistant referees (VAR), saying they must be "the same for both teams" following their 3-2 defeat at Brighton.
results.title: Brighton 3-2 Everton: VAR decisions must be the same for both teams - Marco Silva

results.description: Everton travel to Brighton in the Premier League - follow Final Score and live text commentary.

results.title: Brighton and Hove Albion v Everton in the Premier League

results.description: Follow three Premier League games after Manchester City beat Aston Villa at Etihad Stadium.
results.shortTitle: Pulisic hat-trick for Chelsea as they survive late Burnley goals
results.title: Premier League latest: Man City, Chelsea, West Ham in action

results.description: Jack Grealish scores one and makes the other as Aston Villa come from behind to beat 10-man Brighton at Villa Park.
results.shortTitle: Villa beat Brighton in injury time
results.title: Aston Villa 2-1 Brighton: Grealish inspires Villa to late win over 10-man Brighton

results.description: Aston Villa boss Dean Smith questions VAR and says Conor Hourihane's disallowed goal should've stood in their 2-1 win over Brighton.
results.title: Aston Villa 2-1 Brighton: Dean Smith questions VAR after Villa's 2-1 win over Brighton

results.description: Brighton manager Graham Potter says he is proud of his players despite a 2-1 defeat to Aston Villa at at Villa Park.
results.shortTitle: Potter proud of Brighton players despite defeat
results.title: Aston Villa 2-1 Brighton: Graham Potter proud of players despite defeat
